name: A Balloon Festival is no place for Superheroes
name_original: A Balloon Festival is no place for Superheroes
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 34

Theme: 2-button controls

A superhero person is currently flying around during an intense hot air balloon festival. You need to run along his cape to avoid falling to your death!

I'm not sure what has put you in this situation, to be honest...

Controls:

Up to jump whilst running on the cape

Up and Down control movement whilst in the air

Made using Haxe, and Luxe
